title: Vella Raja
overview: The cat and mouse game begins with Theresa's posting in Chennai. Her vow to clean up the city from drugs leads her to Deva. Deva's drive to be the drug lord is paved with murders and politics. People who enter Bava Lodge on that day are caught in the crossfire of deceit and betrayal between Deva and Theresa. Who will survive in the lodge? Will Theresa be able to catch Deva and end the drug war?
